definitions.definition: The state or condition of being a lord.
(hence, with "his" or "your", often capitalised) Title applied to a lord, bishop, judge, or another man with a title.
definitions.example: May I ask that the order be granted, if your lordship so pleases?

definitions.definition: (with "his" or "your") A boy or man who is behaving in a seigneurial manner or acting like a lord, behaving in a bossy manner or lording it up
Seigniory; domain; the territory over which a lord holds jurisdiction; a manor.
